org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.custom

Interface CustomInventory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Identifiable, Inventory, java.lang.Iterable<Inventory>, Nameable, OrderedInventory

    public interface CustomInventory
extends OrderedInventory, Identifiable
    A CustomInventory is an inventory that has no backing in the world that is created by plugins.
